entry.title: Turkey Declares State of Emergency in Quake-Hit Regions
entry.content: Snowfall and blocked roads hindered efforts to respond to two powerful earthquakes that killed more than 7,500 people in southern Turkey and northern Syria, leading Turkeyâ€™s president to declare a three-month state of emergency in affected areas.

entry.title: Russia Pushes on Several Fronts in Ukraine
entry.content: Russian forces launched several attacks in eastern Ukraine, pushing for a breakthrough on the battlefield ahead of the delivery of new Western weapons.
